response.overview: Short film (2024) - Norway - Two friends spend a weekend in a luxurious cabin in the woods discussing life choices and their concerns about climate change. Contradictions arise from their actions, lifestyle, and attitudes. Their attempt to connect with nature feels forced and awkward, often interrupted by technology and challenged by the almost sinister presence of a flock of starlings.
response.tagline: Two friends in a cabin are concerned about climate change and the sinister presence of a flock of starlings.
response.title: The Green Country
